attributes.action: do not revoke the TV license
attributes.additional_details: Because the BBC is a principled, public serving institution like no other and the government needs a body like this to hold them accountable. The public want this. Don't take it away from us.
attributes.background: do not revoke the TV license. The UK public prides itself in having a funded TV station that serves them through education, holding institutions accountable through news, current affairs and challenging drama. Privatising the BBC threatens all of this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
